text: They delivered the metalonin which is going to expire in dec whereby am paying full price when I order in July. They told me non-refundable and non-exchange. Utterly disappointed by Raffles Health. Emailed with no reply from them. Called but keep brushing me off.
Not sure why the reviews are bad, the staff are beyond lovely. I told the woman I’m going to Vietnam and she set me up with everything I needed. Lovely experience and great product options.

Very BAD services. AVOID HERE!

Ms. LEE started closing the shop at 6:30PM, while their info badge says it is opened until 7PM. What’s more, they ask for CASH ONLY but DON‘T have the change. How ridiculous is that!?!?!?

Horrible. Been 3weeks since I submitted reinstatement form and nothing.

Update- 4th week and called back to a kind lady this time who serviced me really well and was patient with my concerns and enquiries.

So many legacy infrastructure and processes slowing you down if you don't already look at the reviews of hand. Hope you can do something about it.

ART Test kit is double the price as compared to other  pharmacies( Watson, Guardian)
They are selling 2 test kits for $15.50 ( Standard Q)

The staff is occupied with her own mobile device and was unfriendly when  interrupted
